channel.title: [508] please read
channel.description:
ok i have disabled it so when players drop it will not show on ground nor will it show in inventory.
i have set up summoning 100% and when you drop the pouch it wont work.
im guessing its because i disabled drops.
sooo how would i make an exception so i can drop certain ids?
Thanks In Advance!
Brandon!

item.title: [508] please read
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I only see part of DropItem.java there.

But this section of code:

if (p.rights >= 0) { Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot, p.itemsN[itemSlot]); return; }looks like it has your problem. Basically change “p.rights >= 0” to “itemId != allowedItemId && itemId != allowedItemId2” etc

Read full topic

item.title: [508] please read
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok sweet! Thanks.

ok here is my dropitem.java

[code]
package net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler;

import net.com.codeusa.model.;
import net.com.codeusa.model.games.;
import net.com.codeusa.model.followers.;
import net.com.codeusa.;

public class DropItem implements Packet {
/**
* Handles dropping items in your inventory.
* @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
* @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
* @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
*/
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
if (p == null || p.stream == null || p.isDead) {
return;
}
int junk = p.stream.readDWord();
int itemSlot = p.stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
int itemId = p.stream.readUnsignedWord();
if (itemSlot < 0 || itemSlot >= p.items.length || p.items[itemSlot] != itemId) {
return;
}
if (p.rights >= 0) {
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot, p.itemsN[itemSlot]);
return;
}
if (itemId == 13290) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Your Vesta’s longsword shatters as it hits the ground.”);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot, p.itemsN[itemSlot]);
p.degrade = 6000;
p.degrades = false;
return;
}
p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 2739, 1, 0, 0);
Followers follow = new Followers§;
WarriorGuild wGuild = new WarriorGuild§;
boolean failedDropping = false;
if (itemId == 7581) {
if (!p.summonedPet) {
p.requestAnim(827, 0);
Server.engine.newNPC(follow.getSummonNpc(itemId), p.absX-1, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, 0);
follow.setSummonedNpc(true);
}
}
switch (itemId) {

[code]

where might i add an exception for some ids so i can drop them?[/code]
